creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Embroidered coat-of-arms on heavy ribbed silk, surmounted by ducal coronet. Arms: per pale, gold a demi-eagle displayed black above blue a silkworm fly bendwise gold; red a tower white. Mantling gold. This division of the shield, per pale, the dexter side per fess not encountered in English heraldry.
title: Coat-of-arms
